summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        Your task: Provide a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image, focusing on its relevance to gameplay. 
        Describe key visual elements such as characters, enemies, UI components (e.g., health bars, icons), environments, or any text hints present. 
        Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a combat scene in a snowy environment from a video game. A character, likely the player, is engaged in battle with two enemies. One enemy, with wings and a staff, is airborne, while the other, wielding a glowing red weapon, is on the ground. The player character is also holding a weapon with a similar red glow. The user interface shows various icons on the left and right sides, indicating available abilities or items. A health bar and other status indicators are visible at the bottom of the screen. The snowy forest setting adds to the atmosphere of the encounter.
